title: A sermon preached before the Kings Maiestie on Sunday the seventeenth of February last, at White-Hall by Dor VVren, the Master of St Peters Colledge in Cambridge, and his Maiesties chaplaine. Printed by command
author: Wren, Matthew, 1585-1667.
publisher: By Thomas and Iohn Buck, printers to the Vniversitie,
notes: The year is given according to Lady Day dating.
The first leaf is blank except for signature-mark "[fleuron]".
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
